subject: Economy
question_en: What is the major crop grown in Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान में बीजन क्या सफलतापूर्वक जानकारी दो।
explanation_en: Cotton is a major crop grown in Rajasthan and contributes significantly to the state's economy.
explanation_hi: राजस्थान में कॉट्टन एक मेहनता पूर्वक विशेषता दें।

subject: Economy
question_en: What is the primary industry of Rajasthan?
explanation_en: Rajasthan is predominantly an agrarian state, with agriculture being its primary industry.
explanation_hi: राजस्थान एक स्नैया राज्य है, जहां कामवाचकर विभिज्ञान
Rajasthan is predominantly an agrarian state, with agriculture being its primary industry.
